name: I cant think in 2 directions at once
name_original: I cant think in 2 directions at once
description:
I made this in around 5 hours because I couldn't sleep, please don't judge me, I needed something to distract myself with...

I may come back to this to finish it properly, I may not, I don't know right now, I am le tired.

Mad love to Evan King and his 20XX album, all that you hear is his
https://evanking.bandcamp.com/...

CONTROLS

WASD for left orb, Arrow keys for right orb. Alternatively left and right analogue stick on a gamepad. 

Use your beam to destroy the things, because we don't like things, they can just fuck right off

I'm going to bed now
